name: Regional Climate Change Trivia
description: Do you know all there is to know about climate change? Test your knowledge with some quick, fun trivia! There are three quizzes to choose from (based on regional ecosystem) that encompass all eight states Interstate-10 travels through. At the end, you can select any of these states to get a close up of how climate change is affecting each one. This game is best played in full-screen mode. Have fun!
